summary: A small \"outpost\" in the north of Falkreath. Player home with safe chests, Npc\'s which will follow and protect you. Otherwise they patrol, sleep or eat. A mine where altmer work hard, because they have to pay for their actions.
descriptionHtml:
!!!!! NPC\'s WILL NOT WORK AND ARE NOT PLACED!!!!


The doors are locked, you can lockpick them or search another way. A key is placed on the table at the campfire.

- redone Walls, it\'s harder to enter the Outpost without the key
- renamed the House, Key, mine and NPC (still not working)
- redone lights in the house

The containers in the house are safe, i hope^^. The mine respawns.


The groundplan from the House is the riverwood trader and the mine is Kolskeggr. (without forsworn)

Installation

Automatic
Download with Nexusmodmanager and install it with the Manager

Manual
Extract the .zip file and copy&paste the .esp in your ...steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data directory and load it.


Later, i will add a quest to get the key and i will lock the doors, so you have do complete a quest to show the Bosmer that you\'re responsible. 

It\'s located in the northeast of Falkreath, not compatible with Elvenwood or other mods that overwrite POIPineforest33.

Please tell me your ideas and suggestions for improvements! 

My english is terrible so i used  googletranslator for some parts *shame*.
author: Konahrik
